DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read security actions, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read security actions, on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read security actions, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security actions
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or update security actions, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security actions
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and update security actions, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security actions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or update security actions, without a signed-in user.
